title: My Anime Expo Loot - League of Legends
body:
Since I saw other people discussing Anime Expo, I'm curious what kind of awesome League of Legends loot you all got from Anime Expo this year.

My gf and I ended up buying a ton of posters + poro from the artist alley, but we tried to be at least a bit controlled with our spending :P



**hi-res link: **

http://i.imgur.com/5es4oLI.jpg

replies.body: too bad they dont host anime expo in N.O. its just comic con and random doctor/ black convention type never an anime one

Why don't you stream anymore? ;~;

Pretty great posters!

My morning schedule has kind of screwed up my ability to stream, sadly :(

Some day maybe!
Why does NA get to have the best events?
You were at Anime Expo, but didn't attend the gatherings or spend much time at the Riot booth?

I attended both the booth + the cosplay gatherings, but merely as a spectator and not a Rioter (though, didn't miss a chance to chat with an excited LoL player).  Though a few observant people noticed my Riot backpack :D
